labels.note: Arrange the order in which shipping methods are displayed in the web store. Use drag and drop to reorder them

descriptions.name: Name of the pickup location point
descriptions.geoLocation: Enter latitude and longitude separated by a comma without spaces, e.g. 41.40338,8.17403
descriptions.outerId: Unique ID to connect pickup location to external system
descriptions.description: Description for the pickup location point
descriptions.working-hours: Information about working hours of the pickup point

placeholders.name: Enter name
placeholders.outerId: Enter ID in an outer system
placeholders.description: Provide description for the pickup location point

pickup-location-delete.title: Delete pickup location
pickup-location-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the pickup location?

pickup-location-save.title: Save pickup location
pickup-location-save.message: The pickup location has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

shipping-method-save.title: Save shipping method
shipping-method-save.message: The shipping method has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

Shipping.Bopis.GoogleMaps.Enabled.title: Enable Google Maps for BOPIS
Shipping.Bopis.GoogleMaps.Enabled.description: Show store pickup locations using Google Maps

Shipping.Bopis.GoogleMaps.ApiKey.title: Google Maps API Key
Shipping.Bopis.GoogleMaps.ApiKey.description: API key used to load Google Maps for store pickup display
